channel.title: Personal on Riccardo Marinelli
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Riccardo Marinelli

item.title: Music
item.description: Here I will list some interesting things related to music that come to my mind: Pastorali Tarantine, traditional Christmas compositions which remind the music of the Sheperds that worship the baby Jesus. “The song of the prophecies”, a Chatolic chant which collects the prophecies about the coming of the Saviour; it is executed during the nine days before Christmas. Here I share an Italian translation of the original (in latin) and the PDF was realised by myself thanks to Gregoriotex, a package to write Gregorian chant in $\Latex$.
